entry.title: Sri Lanka's Farmers Struggle to Feed the Country---and Themselves
entry.content: The economic crisis gripping the island nation of 22 million led to a ban on fertilizer imports last year, and the coming harvest is expected to be disastrous.

entry.title: Ukraine's Southern Forces Wage a Slow Campaign to Wear Russian Troops Down
entry.content: Rather than a dramatic ground assault, Ukraineâ€™s push to retake occupied southern territory has become a series of artillery strikes designed to cut Russian supply lines and isolate occupying troops in the region.
